2025-01-27.description: Ajay loves living in America, and he says until recently it felt like America loved having him.

2025-01-26.description: BOGOTA, Colombia (AP) — U.S. President Donald Trump said Sunday that he was ordering tariffs, visa restrictions and other retaliatory measures to be taken against Colombia after its government rejected two flights carrying migrants. Trump made the announcemen…

2025-02-25.title: Trump to Offer ‘Gold Card’ Visas for $5 Million to the Rich
2025-02-25.description: President Donald Trump said he is starting a program to offer residency and a path to citizenship to investors who pay $5 million, offering a new avenue for legal immigration even as he carries out a sweeping crackdown on undocumented migrants.

2025-02-26.title: US will sell ‘gold card’ to wealthy foreigners, Trump says, replacing EB-5 visa program
2025-02-26.description: President Donald Trump said the US would be selling what he described as a “gold card” to wealthy foreigners, giving them the right to live and work in the US and offering a path to citizenship in exchange for a $5 million fee.

2025-02-26.title: Trump says $5m 'gold card' immigration idea will 'sell like crazy'
2025-02-26.description: Trump say wealthy investors will buy the visas and create jobs in the US, while helping pay off US debt.

2025-03-10.title: Dad of detained US tourist urges care on visa requirements
2025-03-10.description: Becky Burke, 28, has spent 10 days in a facility in Washington State and is desperate to come home.

2025-03-17.title: Doctor at Brown University deported to Lebanon despite US judge’s order | CNN
2025-03-17.description: A Rhode Island doctor who is an assistant professor at Brown University’s medical school has been deported to Lebanon even though a judge had issued an order blocking the U.S. visa holder’s immediate removal from the country, according to court papers.

2025-03-17.title: Prince Harry: Deadline looms for Homeland Security to release visa records
2025-03-17.description: A US judge ordered the prince's immigration record to be made public after a think tank alleged he lied about past drug use.

2025-03-18.title: Prince Harry's US visa documents unsealed after drug claims
2025-03-18.description: They are heavily redacted, and no details have been given as to what he put on his immigration form.

2025-03-20.title: US court blocks deportation of Georgetown University researcher
2025-03-20.description: Immigration officials accuse Badar Khan Suri, an Indian academic on a student visa, of "spreading Hamas propaganda", an allegation he denies.

2025-03-26.description: Attorneys for a Cornell graduate student whose student visa was recently revoked and has been targeted for deportation by the Trump administration said the case will be a test to determine whether the US government can target people for expressing views that …

2025-03-30.title: Secret filming reveals brazen tactics of UK visa sponsorship scammers
2025-03-30.description: An undercover BBC investigation exposes how rogue agents are exploiting a UK visa scheme.

2025-03-28.title: Cornell student activist denied bid to immediately stop the government from trying to deport him | CNN
2025-03-28.description: A judge on Thursday declined to immediately block the U.S. government from taking steps to deport a Cornell University student whose visa was revoked over his participation in campus demonstrations.

2025-03-29.title: They’ve lived in the US on visas and work permits for decades. Now they’re in ICE detention | CNN
2025-03-29.description: Amid the Trump administration’s immigration crackdown, some longtime US residents like Taylor who have visas, work permits or green cards face possible deportation.

2025-04-01.title: Cornell student activist chooses to leave US after judge denies bid to block deportation | CNN
2025-04-01.description: A Cornell University student whose visa was revoked over his participation in pro-Palestinian campus demonstrations says he is leaving the United States voluntarily after a judge denied a request that the government not take steps to deport him.

2025-04-01.title: Cornell University student targeted by Trump leaves the US
2025-04-01.description: British citizen Momodou Taal had his visa revoked due to protest activities opposing Israel.
